error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '/' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 3
If the art piece was bought at $4000, and its price in three years will be three times its buying price, it will be worth 3*$4000 = $12000 in another three years.
The price of the art piece will increase by $12000/$4000 = $<<12000/4000=3>>3
